OTHER.description:
Zo Zo Zombie and Snot Zombie head to the cinema and duke it out to win the coveted snack: Choco Donkeys.  Isamu gets stuck in a bathroom stall and Zo Zo must brave a million obstacles as he rushes across town to get toilet paper to his best friend. Zo Zo stinks his way to the top in an underground Ultimate Farting Championship to win a lost bet for his friend Panda Zombie. Zo Zo and Isamu are stuck on a runaway Zombie Bus on: Bacon Cake Day.
Source: crunchyroll

Isamu and Zo Zo Zombie lure and capture the Tuna Fish Weeds to steal back Uncle Zombo’s tuna! Samurai Zombie challenges Zo Zo to a real life duel. Zo Zo is in the sewers to retrieve Uncle Zombo`s coveted Golden Monkey after he accidently flushes it down the toilet. Dark Zombie hijacks a donut truck to use in an evil ritual, and with help from Zombie Bus, Zo Zo restores everything right in the donut universe.
Source: crunchyroll

Zo Zo Zombie attempts to beat Takoski after he transforms himself into the coolest undead drone at the local drone race. Zo Zo needs to mail a card for Isamu’s Grandma’s birthday, but Zombie Hunter Joe is determined that the line between humanity and zombies must be drawn at the post office. Zo Zo miraculously saves the day after Isamu accidentally knocks a precious family spit vase into the air. Isamu and Zo Zo “buddy-up” with Zombie Rich Girl to take advantage of her VIP status at a food truck festival, but in order to do that they’ll have to keep up with her bottomless stomach and extreme tastes.
Source: crunchyroll

Zo Zo Zombie takes an emergency trip to the eye doctor after he accidently swaps his own eyes with Takoski`s prozon beam nodes that start shooting fire and laser beams everywhere! Uncle Zombo put Isamu and Zo Zo  under a “security measures” test in order to earn Isamu’s birthday gift. While Samurai Zombie notices Isamu has parked his bicycle in a motorcycle spot, Zo Zo  must stop Samurai’s quest for “justice”. Zo Zo`s smelly dirty socks turn into a giant sock monster that rampages through the city and it’s up to Zo Zo and Robozombie Zobinga to stop the destruction!
Source: crunchyroll

Zo Zo Zombie, Isamu and Panda Zombie’s camping trip is interrupted by Zombie Hunter Joe as he chases them through the forest. Zo Zo’s stomach gets so hangry it escapes and grows into a threat to the entire city! Zo Zo and Mochi use banana hot dogs to tempt it back into Zo Zo Zombie’s body returning the world to a safe place. Zo Zo transforms his body into a surfboard to help Isamu ride waves on the last day of summer… but Shark Zombie has other ideas.
Isamu invites Zo Zo Zombie over for a shish kebab dinner, but Zo Zo has to visit the laundromat first, making the mistake of staining the honor of Samurai Zombie and ensuing a fierce swordfight!
Source: crunchyroll

Isamu and Zo Zo Zombie join up with a losing backlot dodgeball team only to discover they’re playing against an entire team of snot zombies cloned from Snot Zombie himself. Dark Zombie’s bid to open the Realm of Ultimate Darkness is stalled unless he can find someone to sacrifice. Zo Zo Zombie must fend off the evil one’s demonic attacks and deliver Isamu’s cold medicine! Zo Zo Zombie gets the bright idea to walk Mochi in the park off leash, but is soon spotted by Big Cop, leaving Zo Zo and Mochi chased clear into earth’s orbit. Zo Zo Zombie orders a zombie robot vacuum cleaner to prepare to host a fancy house party, but there’s a problem: It won’t stop vacuuming! It turns out to be an undead creature with an insatiable appetite and Zo Zo must find a way to ease its hunger before it sucks up everything in the house.
Source: crunchyroll

Isamu and Zo Zo Zombie’s model drone crashes in the graveyard. Dark Zombie refuses to give the drone back until the pair help him summon a dark lord of the undead. Zo Zo Zombie and Isamu rescue Panda Zombie who is locked out of the zoo, which leads to a chase through every animal enclosure in attempts to escape Shark Zombie! Zo Zo Zombie unintentionally zombifies the clog of a bathtub drain while trying to unclog it, unleashing it into an unsuspecting world. Zo Zo Zombie sets out to defend Zombie Rich Girl who is turned away by a snobby clothing store clerk. When the clerk then treats Zo Zo just as badly, he takes revenge and makes her life a living zombie hell.
Source: crunchyroll

Isamu and Zo Zo Zombie attempt to end a delicious barrage of falling donuts from the sky attempting to save wastage! Zo Zo is attacked with a single sneeze from Snot Zombie, infecting him with hundreds of microscopic Snot Zombies that take over his brain. Zo Zo creates a microscopic version of himself to regain control of his brain! Zo Zo Zombie unintentionally hook and interrupt the Lake Creature whilst fishing peacefully at the lake, leaving Isamu and Zo Zo to settle an underwater war. Isamu and Zo Zo Zombie work to endure Mr. Organ to drive the new super-fast go karts and beat Snot Zombie in the race!
Source: crunchyroll

Isamu’s new toy baton gets accidently zombified, transforming into the voracious Bato, who goes wild and begins to systematically destroy the entire house. Isamu and Zo Zo must calm him and clean the house before Mom gets home! Zo Zo has the great idea of having Snowra pretend to be snow sculpture, until Snowra, starving of freid chicken, becomes a terrifying monster.  Isamu is competing in a ping pong tournament when Baseball Zombie barges in and steals the ping pong ball! To save the tournament, Zo Zo must first beat the Baseball bully and his sidekick at their own game to retrieve the lost ball. Zo zo is honored that the town mayor has offered to build a new skate park, but first must take him to the barber for a new haircut. Zo Zo takes him to Barbershop Zombie who inevitably gives him a disastrous haircut, and Zo Zo attempts to save the day offering him a wig made of his own intestines.
Source: crunchyroll

Snake Charmer Zombie’s act is dying because his Snake Zombie won’t cooperate. Zo Zo offers his guts as a substitute snake, which get eaten by jealous Snake Zombie instead. Inside the snake Zo Zo meets up with Keith, also a snake snack, and together they devise a hot-sauce escape!
Isamu and Zo Zo call in Angel Zombie to help them with Uncle Zombo’s chores, but she is wise and calls in her own back-up team: the Payback Zombies, who teach them a lesson about laziness. Isamu and Zo Zo make friends with Bellow the Cloud, who shows them the ability to change shapes and transform water into rain or snow. Isamu has the bright idea to feed him donuts, in hopes that Bellow will rain donuts all over the land. Following a grocery shop, Uncle Zombo’s favorite hot sauce is stolen by the Lake Monster, who, as a water-based monster soon realizes he probably shouldn’t have left to see what the fuss was all about!
Source: crunchyroll

Isamu is smitten by Idol Zombie and badly wants to play guitar with her, terrorizing everyone within earshot with his ear-splitting awfulness, until Camera Zombie security puts an end to his aspirations and his guitar. Isamu’s hair is cursed into a bouffant after conjuring a dark spell in attempts to get back at Dark Zombie. Instead they conjure up Witch Zombie whose spell accidentally creates Muscle Monster from Zo Zo’s muscles, leaving no one safe in the forest. 
Zo Zo becomes irritated after finding his entire snack machine at the mall missing, denying him of Choco-Donkeys. This causes the hangry Snowra to transform into a huge monster, and soon Zo Zo and his new friend Transfer Student Jay are running for their lives. Isamu is determined to out-prank master prankster, Uncle Zombo, but time after time the master schools the student. Finally, Isamu calls in expert: Snowman Zombie, who agrees to help Isamu and Zo Zo, but give them more than they bargained for.
Source: crunchyroll

Zo Zo Zombie gets sucked up into a space ship by mysterious alien scientists, who proves himself to be indestructible after being poked and prodded. Zo Zo and his new feathered falcon friend take a thrilling ride in the sky. He later finds out it belongs to Zombie Hunter Joe, and the two battle for the bird’s loyalty. As Zo Zo swings through the city on his extended intestines, he collides with a building getting the attention of a big-time movie director who hires him as a stuntman for his action flick. It’s all perfect, until he learns there are fake zombies in sight. Zo Zo and Dark Zombie find an abandoned baby raccoon and decide to become its parents, however they later learn it was a decoy, putting them in danger!
Source: crunchyroll

Isamu and Zo Zo Zombie encounter Hipster Zombie in the cemetery, and decide to have Zo Zo teach him the zombie ropes. They later learn he’s a know-it-all, and better off back underground, in his coffin. Zo Zo tries out Isamu’s new video game, but doesn’t go so well. Frustrated, he accidentally zombifies the game which comes alive and takes off leading a wild chase across the city! Zo Zo and Isamu find an empty cardboard box which turns out to be the sophisticated but highly irritable robot, Hakonosuke. They give him a donut as a peace offering which instead blows its fuses, and now its up to Professor Hanouri to fix it. Zo Zo and Isamu discover the wind they’re using for flying their kite is produced by a strange being: Kita! Kits teaches them about wind, and in exchange they introduce him to their own magic: donuts!
Source: crunchyroll

Zo Zo accidently winds up in a model volcano science project competition after destroying Isamu’s!  Zo Zo and Isamu run amok in Dr. Hanouri’s lab after not following orders. Zo Zo picks up a parasite at the park that won’t leave! Zo Zo and Isamu crash Zombie Rich Girl’s pool party, but aren’t so popular after Zo Zo’s projectile vomiting.
Source: crunchyroll

The whole Tireson family moves in with Zo Zo, testing his patience. Zo Zo and Isamu’s prank goes awry when Lord of the River takes over Uncle Zombo’s mansion. Zo Zo’s plan to impress Zombie Rich Girl at a café goes wrong when he learns the Zombie Flower he wants to give her tries to eat him! Zo Zo signs up for superhero classes, which only end up exposing his super zero-ness.
Source: crunchyroll

Terrified of trick-or-treaters in costumes, Zo Zo attempts to hide from Zombie Hunter Joe! Zo Zo mistakenly transforms Isamu’s backpack into a hungry zombie homework eater! Zo Zo’s diary full of embarrassing sketches of his love Zombie Rich Girl falls into the wrong hands! Zo Zo wakes up with half of his brain missing, after it goes wandering to find a more thrill-seeking body.
Source: crunchyroll

Zo Zo’s arms accidently get severed in a deadly battle and refuse to re-attach. Zo Zo, Isamu and Takoski the Alien are zapped into the stratosphere taking them all over the world. Zo Zo,  Mochi and Snot Zombie battle for the last donut in a bag, leading them into Sludge Zombie’s sewer. Zo Zo’s stinky underwear has been claimed by bees, who create an angry swarm as he tries to reclaim them.
Source: crunchyroll

Zo Zo takes on a boxing match against Boxer Zombie to win the Donut Belt! Zo Zo and Isamu enter through a portal where humans are zombies and zombies are humans. Zo Zo gives cardboard-box robot Hakonosuke his heart to make him human, however it backfires! Innocent Isamu and Zo Zo are mistakenly chased for stealing pies after Snot Zombie disguises himself as Zo Zo.
Source: crunchyroll

Zo Zo finds a ‘lucky’ four-leaf clover but soon learns it belongs to angry Zombie Rabbit, and to break the spell he must lose it. Zo Zo and Transfer Student Jay continue their battle with Zombie Hunter Joe in an abandoned mansion. Zo Zo awakens and enrages a mummy whilst on a class trip at the museum. Zo Zo competes in a series of death-defying challenges in the “Zombie Nightmare Challenge” show.
Source: crunchyroll

Zo Zo learns some new skateboarding tricks and becomes quite popular! Isamu and Zo Zo build themselves a mechbot to make life easier moving around. Isamu helps Zo Zo find a new apartment, however landlord Snot Zombie soon learns he can’t keep up with Zo Zo’s messiness and nasty habits! Zo Zo and Isamu attempt to cool down in the heat with a drinking fountain that has a malicious mind of its own!
Source: crunchyroll

Zo Zo is lured into a series of deadly traps, with delicious donuts dangled as bait. Zo Zo takes Isamu to watch the Monster Truck Race and wind up entering the Zo Zo Monster Truck race. Zo Zo falls in love with zombie girl Fiona, but soon learns she is a stage 5 clinger and he must free himself of her. Zo Zo comes down with a bad case of Gut Bugs leaving him helpless against Boxer Zombie.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zo Zo Zombie: Chapter Twenty One

OTHER.description:
Zo Zo gives himself a flowing new mustache to impress Zombie Rich Girl, until it flows too much! Isamu and Zo Zo steal Takoski’s spaceship and take Mochi for a visit to his home planet. Zo Zo loses his apartment key and has to go back in time to find it. Shogun Zombie attempts to claim Isamu’s house which leads to a battle of who will stay and who will go.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zo Zo Zombie: Chapter Twenty Two

OTHER.description:
Zo Zo and Isamu accidentally activate Professor’s Honeori’s Personality-Reverser Ray! The earth is plunged into freezing temperatures and Isamu and Zo Zo enlist Takoski’s help. Zo Zo is recruited to be the goalie of his local hockey team but finds the job may be too violent for him. Zo Zo tries out Isamu’s new VR headset and is convinced the “virtual” counterattacks he sees are real!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zo Zo Zombie: Chapter Twenty Three

OTHER.description:
Zo Zo and Isamu steal Professor Honeori’s Delicious-izer machine for their cooking. Zo Zo tries out a new video game, which turns out to be Mr. Demon in disguise who tricks Zo Zo and traps him inside his game! Isamu starts sleepwalking and Zo Zo must follow him to save him. Zo Zo falls asleep during a marathon chess session, and dreams he is the King of a medieval castle under attack.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zo Zo Zombie: Chapter Twenty Four

OTHER.description:
Idol Zombie admires Zo Zo’s new gut “scarves and insists she have a hundred of them. Isamu casts Zo Zo as his monster in his horror film school project, but soon decides he isn’t scary enough. Zo Zo and Isamu help Bellow’s mom after finding out he has been cloud-napped! Isamu and Zo Zo visit a deserted tropical island and wind up being pulled by the tide into the ocean!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zo Zo Zombie: Chapter Twenty Five

OTHER.description:
When Santa Zombie and his reindeer get stuck in a trap,  Zo Zo and Isamu must deliver all the presents to the zombie boys and girls themselves! Isamu and Zo Zo are in the finals of “World’s Best Zombie Rockers” where they will compete for the grand prize: the chance to make a music video with music icon, Idol Zombie!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zo Zo Zombie: Chapter Twenty Six

WIKIPEDIA_JP: ゾゾゾ_ゾンビーくん#テレビアニメ

titles.title: ゾゾゾ ゾンビーくん (2020)
